entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Сhecking for NULL #92566
  • Property Attribute Not Returned By PropertyDescriptor Attributes #92565
  • FixedWindowRateLimiter miscalculates `Retry-After` value #92557
  • GetNonRandomizedHashCode produces too many collisions for small strings #92556
  • Should `JIT_UpdateWriteBarrierState` be in the patchable section or not? #92554
  • Is the `_TEST` section a typo? #92553
    9.0.0
  • <WasiAfterRuntimeLoaded> is broken in wasi-wasm workflow #92551

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: InitialCapacity for CborWriter #91978
    9.0.0
  • Standalone GC, GC_IsCompatibleWithRuntime(), building a standalone GC for multiple runtime versions #92536
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ref T MemoryMarshal.ReadRef<T>(ReadOnlySpan<byte>) API #92559
  • [API Proposal]: Hash and HMAC one-shots for HashAlgorithName #91407
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ObjectContentType to getObjectContent #92562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce 1 possible string allocation in `System.RuntimeType.SplitName` #92558
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Split off patched code into separate .S file and disable subsections-via-symbols for it #92555
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fixed the order of WASI_AFTER_RUNTIME_LOADED_CALLS #92552
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 117.0.5938.92, windows: 117.0.5938.92 #92545
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Remove some nullchecks for frozen objects #92561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Support SIMD sizes for remainders in store decomposition #92469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Reimport full spill clique for I_IMPL<->BYREF mismatches #92307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed wrong comment in Marshalling/*Marshaller.cs #92563
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement InitialCapacity on CborWriter. #92538
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Fixed broken ECMA links #92547
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix doc comment #92531
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Use invariant culture for CBOR #92539
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • HashAlgorithmName one-shots #92430
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Generate gsharedvt versions of the callvirt delegate invoke wr… #92472
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • JIT: Register field seqs for GC pointer constants in side table #92540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • The IConfiguration.GetSection method will not return null, call the IConfigurationSection.Exists extension method to determine. #91832
    area-Extensions-Logging, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Clarify MatchAbbreviatedMonthName comment #92405
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
